PHRASE.LANG: kName
Decorative Plant, Dumb Cane
Plante décorative, Cannes des muets
Dekorative Pflanze, Dieffenbachia
Pianta decorativa - Dieffenbachia
Planta decorativa, Difenbaquia
観葉植物・ディフェンバキアカミーラ
관엽식물, 디펜바키아 카밀라
House Plant, Dumb Cane
盆栽：白葉萬年青
盆栽：白葉萬年青
Decorative Plant, Dumb Cane
kDesc
The dumb cane has large and wide leaves that are coloured white in the middle.[#Legal]
Les cannes des muets ont de larges et longues feuilles qui sont colorées en blanc au milieu.[#Legal]
Die Dieffenbachia hat lange und breite Blätter, die in der Mitte weiß gefärbt sind.[#Legal]
La dieffenbachia ha delle foglie molto grandi con la parte interna di colore bianco.[#Legal]
La difenbaquia posee hojas de considerable longitud y anchura, coloreadas de blanco en su parte central.[#Legal]
幅広い葉に白い斑が入った、ディフェンバキアカミーラの観葉植物。[#Legal]
넓은 잎에 흰 반점이 들어간 관엽식물 디펜바키아 카밀라. [#Legal]
A house plant named dumb cane. The broad leaves have white spots over them.[#Legal]
白葉萬年青盆栽。闊大的葉面上有白色斑點[#Legal]
白葉萬年青盆栽。闊大的葉面上有白色斑點[#Legal]
The dumb cane has large and wide leaves that are colored white in the middle.[#Legal]
